title: Canvas效果系列的基本代码
content: *{ margin:0; padding:0; } #app-id{ position:absolute; width:100%; height:100%; flex-direction:column; .ivu-slider::before,.ivu-slider::after{ display:table; content:""; } } #header-id{ width:100%; padding:10px 40px 0; &:after{ display:block; content:" "; } } #effect-id{ display:block; border-color: #D61827; border-style:solid; } new Vue({ el:"#app-id", data:{ canvasDom:null, width:0, height:0, pen:null, borderWidth:1, color:"", data:[], enterX:0, enterY:0, isStart:false, }, methods:{ mouse_enter($event){ this.isStart = true; this.color = 'hsl('+(Math.random()*360)+',60%,80%)'; this.pen.fillStyle = this.color; this.enterX = $event.pageX - this.canvasDom.offsetLeft - this.borderWidth; this.enterY = $event.pageY - this.canvasDom.offsetTop - this.borderWidth if(this.data.length == 0){ this.start(); } }, mouse_move($event){ this.enterX = $event.pageX - this.canvasDom.offsetLeft - this.borderWidth; this.enterY = $event.pageY - this.canvasDom.offsetTop - this.borderWidth }, mouse_leave(){ this.isStart = false; }, start(){ if(this.isStart){ this.data.push({ }) } this.pen.clearRect(0,0,this.width,this.height); for(let i=0;i 0){ requestAnimationFrame(()=>{ this.start(); }) } else{ this.pen.clearRect(0,0,this.width,this.height) } } }, mounted(){ this.canvasDom = document.getElementById("effect-id"); this.headerDom = document.getElementById("header-id"); this.pen = this.canvasDom.getContext("2d"); var computed = ()=>{ let headerDomComputedStyle = window.getComputedStyle(this.headerDom); let width = window.innerWidth; let height = window.innerHeight - ( parseInt(headerDomComputedStyle.height) || 0) this.canvasDom.setAttribute("width",width-2*this.borderWidth) this.canvasDom.setAttribute("height",height-2*this.borderWidth) this.width = width; this.height = height; } computed(); window.addEventListener('resize',computed); } })
